javadoc: Query implementation used to test a field in a record to fall within a range of values.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new FieldRangeQuery that tests a records field against a range of values.

params.name: column
params.comment: the field index in the record to test.

params.name: min
params.comment: the minimum field value to test against.

params.name: max
params.comment: the maximum field value to test against.

name: FieldRangeQuery
comment: Query implementation used to test a field in a record to fall within a range of values.
